title: The "Special Shops" (the discounted shops)
body:
Anyone else having a problem finding it or is it just me? Also if you have found it or know if they just haven't put it on would you comment. Thanks :D
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: It is not in the alpha yet :( You'll have to go to the legacy client to use your shop.
yeah I'm not sure. Friends without the new launcher talking about these sales they got and I cant find the seasonal shop button anywhere.
